page.title: 18LIVING IN STRATHNAIRN
page.content: It can be very cold in our area so it is important to have a good heating system.12 homes have central heating. {Fuel All but 2 homes have electricity.For 4 homes it is the only fuel.14 use solid fuel,2 use oil and 1 uses gas. {Telephone Only 3 houses have no telephone.It can be very important in an emergency. {Clothing 20 families buy their clothes in Inverness.3 families also make their own.3 families use catalogues while 6 families shop elsewhere. {Food 11 families grow their food,12 also buy from Inverarnie stores while all but one shop in Inverness. {Refuse On Wednesdays rubbish is collected from the roadside by Council lorries.
